I am currently studying Strategic Business Development and Entrepreneurship. This major focuses on understanding how businesses can create and implement effective strategies to achieve growth and success, as well as cultivating the skills and knowledge required to identify and seize entrepreneurial opportunities.

In terms of my short-term career goals, I aim to gain practical experience through internships or entry-level positions in strategic business development or entrepreneurship. My long-term career goal is to establish my own successful entrepreneurial venture. I aspire to create and lead a company that addresses a specific market need or offers an innovative solution. Technology and information will play a crucial role in my career path. Technology has the potential to disrupt industries, create new business models, and drive innovation. Information, both in terms of market research and data analytics, will help me make informed decisions, identify trends, and develop competitive strategies.

To ensure that I have the skills needed to compete in the field of strategic business development and entrepreneurship, I should focus on a few key areas. By combining a solid theoretical foundation with practical experience, a keen understanding of technology and information, and a commitment to ongoing skill development, I will position myself to thrive in the dynamic world of strategic business development and entrepreneurship.
